sentences.sContent: Fossil fuels have caused irreversible damage to the environment.
sentences.sCn: 矿物燃料已对环境造成了不可挽回的破坏。

sentences.sContent: ...is urgently needed to lower the risk of irreversible and potentially devastating effects of climate change...
...rapid deforestation combined with the massive burning of fossil fuels is an explosive recipe for an irreversible disaster...
...has been discovering the hard way that admitting people with incompatible cultures is an irreversible decision with incalculable consequences...

synos.tran: 不可逆的；不能取消的；不能翻转的

phrases.pCn: 不可逆过程；单向磁化过程

words.tran: 不可改变的；不能取消的；不能挽回的
不能取消地；不能撤回地

trans.tranOther: irreversible damage, change etc is so serious or so great that you cannot change something back to how it was before
